creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: ceramic bowl, small round foot; blue glaze overall with one purple splash at interior side, darker glaze at rim, unglazed foot
medium: Stoneware with blue glaze and purple markings
text: This small bowl is a striking example of the type of thick, rich opalescent blue with purple splashes that gained popularity at the court of emperor Huizong (r. 1101-1125). The suffused glaze has an exceptional sense of depth and radiant sparkle.
title: Bowl
